data: {"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "concept_name": "Character Role Dynamics", "type": "element", "definition": "How roles in a cast (hero, villain, mentor, sidekick, foil, symbolic figures) balance focus, spark in scenes, and evolve through archetype variations to drive plot and theme.", "scope_notes": "Operate across three pillars from the doc: balance & focus, interactions & scene dynamics, archetypes & variations. Intensity dials low→medium→high.", "axes": "pillar|intensity", "axis_values": "balance_focus|interactions_scene|archetypes_variations | low|medium|high", "prerequisites": "", "pairs_well_with": "identity|drive|decision_style|backstory|change|theme", "conflicts_with": "flat_roles|filler_characters|resetting_conflicts|stereotype_static", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_role_dyn_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_role_dyn_weak_*", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "signal_id": "sig_balance_focus", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "balance_focus", "description": "Narrative weight is distributed intentionally: spotlight shifts, roles matter without overcrowding.", "detection_hint": "Scene time and plot beats reflect planned weights; supporting roles deepen leads.", "false_positive_risks": "One role hogs focus or others feel like props.", "minimal_example": "Ensemble shares beats while pursuing a single goal; sidekick’s beat reframes hero.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "signal_id": "sig_interactions_scene", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "interactions_scene", "description": "Role collisions power scenes (tension, humor, heart) and serve scene goals.", "detection_hint": "Hero–villain standoffs, mentor–student calibrations, foil sparks; each advances plot/character/theme.", "false_positive_risks": "Bickering or banter that changes nothing.", "minimal_example": "A mentor’s calm diffuses chaos; villain’s taunt sharpens the hero’s choice.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "signal_id": "sig_archetypes_variations", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "archetypes_variations", "description": "Classic roles are twisted (reluctant mentor, idealist villain, rebellious sidekick) to fit tone and surprise.", "detection_hint": "Specific tweaks align with world/genre; expectations subverted with purpose.", "false_positive_risks": "Cosmetic quirks that don’t affect function.", "minimal_example": "Reluctant, flawed mentor who creates conflict yet grows the hero.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "signal_id": "sig_intensity_low", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "low", "description": "Subtle dynamics with quiet shifts and gentle contrasts; fits introspective stories.", "detection_hint": "Understated dialogue, shared routines; minor spotlight moves.", "false_positive_risks": "Flatness disguised as subtlety.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "signal_id": "sig_intensity_med", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "medium", "description": "Balanced ensemble energy; noticeable contrasts and role tweaks; subplots carry weight.", "detection_hint": "Clear role contrasts; moderate stakes in scene conflicts.", "false_positive_risks": "Busy but inconsequential motion.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "signal_id": "sig_intensity_high", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "high", "description": "Explosive dynamics and bold reinventions that reshape plot/theme; role reversals at climaxes.", "detection_hint": "Showdowns, betrayals, public choices; irreversible consequences.", "false_positive_risks": "Spectacle with reset next scene.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "misconception_id": "flat_roles", "description": "Static archetypes never affect each other or the plot.", "tells": "Cast reads like bios, not forces.", "likely_causes": "Over-indexing on labels.", "corrective_feedback": "Tie each role to a decision that moves plot/theme.", "micro_drill": "Add one choice per role that costs something.", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "misconception_id": "filler_characters", "description": "Extra roles exist without purpose.", "tells": "Side characters vanish for chapters; no consequences.", "likely_causes": "Padding for flavor.", "corrective_feedback": "Bind every filler to a plot beat or theme echo.", "micro_drill": "Repurpose or cut one filler via a new beat.", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "misconception_id": "resetting_conflicts", "description": "Clashes dissolve without carry-over.", "tells": "Status quo returns immediately.", "likely_causes": "Avoiding complexity.", "corrective_feedback": "Let conflict echo across scenes.", "micro_drill": "Carry one unresolved clash forward two beats.", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "misconception_id": "stereotype_static", "description": "Archetype presented without variation.", "tells": "Predictable, dull roles.", "likely_causes": "Reliance on tropes.", "corrective_feedback": "Twist the role to suit world/tone.", "micro_drill": "Draft one variation that changes a scene outcome.", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_role_balance_weight_map", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "map", "prompt_template": "Assign weights to roles (e.g., hero 40, villain 30, mentor 15, sidekick 15) and check scenes against the target balance.", "expected_features": "Weights reflected in beat distribution; no role feels like filler.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Weights align with scenes; cuts/adds justified", "Meets": "Mostly aligned", "Developing": "Lopsided with no fix"}, "distractor_strategy": "Trap: giving every role equal time regardless of function.", "hint_steps": "1) Set weights 2) Sample scenes 3) Adjust beats", "variation_axes": "balance|beats", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_role_scene_collision", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "For a scene, label the dominant interaction (hero–villain, mentor–student, hero–foil, etc.) and state the scene goal it serves.", "expected_features": "Interaction label matches evidence; goal advances plot/character/theme.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Sharp label + clear goal tie", "Meets": "Reasonable label/goal", "Developing": "Vague"}, "distractor_strategy": "Trap: banter with no function.", "hint_steps": "1) Name roles 2) Quote the spark 3) State the goal", "variation_axes": "interaction|goal", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_role_variation_twist", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Twist one archetype (e.g., mentor→reluctant, villain→idealist) and rewrite the scene to show the change in function.", "expected_features": "Variation affects choices and stakes, not cosmetic flavor.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Twist changes outcome", "Meets": "Twist visible; some effect", "Developing": "Cosmetic only"}, "distractor_strategy": "Trap: quirky mannerisms without function.", "hint_steps": "1) Choose twist 2) Change a choice 3) Land a consequence", "variation_axes": "variation|stakes", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_role_conflict_carry", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "Pick a conflict and script how its consequences carry into 2 later scenes.", "expected_features": "Echoed tension with evolving stakes; no reset.", "scoring_method": "pattern", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Carry-through reshapes later beats", "Meets": "Some echo", "Developing": "Reset"}, "distractor_strategy": "Trap: instant forgiveness.", "hint_steps": "1) Name wound 2) Add echo 3) Raise cost", "variation_axes": "conflict|echo", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_dyn_1", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "axis_value": "balance_focus|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "Ensemble heist splits spotlight; hacker’s beat solves a problem the hero can’t.", "context_tags": "ensemble|function", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_dyn_2", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "axis_value": "interactions_scene|high", "label": "strong", "text": "Villain’s quiet taunt forces hero to choose mercy or speed in the climax.", "context_tags": "stakes|choice", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_dyn_3", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "axis_value": "archetypes_variations|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "Reluctant mentor who withholds help to test resolve, altering the plan.", "context_tags": "subversion|mentor", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_dyn_weak_1", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "Sidekick cracks jokes that never affect outcomes.", "context_tags": "filler", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_dyn_weak_2", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "Big hero–villain fight; next scene nothing has changed.", "context_tags": "reset", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics.md", "source_md5": "5001570f66f92bf3b039e8068b0e8451", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:43:26.691489Z"}
